dct_title_s: Waerachtige beschrӳvinge vande wӳdvermaerde Conincklicke Hooft Stadt Ierusalem
dct_alternative_sm: Waerachtige beschryvinge vande wydvermaerde Conincklicke Hooft Stadt Jerusalem
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
15 pictorial vignettes surrounding the map: [Biblical scenes].
Shows topography, vegetation, drainage, settlements, places of historical interest; plan of Jerusalem.
